column4: Does 11.04 support running as an XDMCP server, and does it support logging in to a remote XDMCP server?
xdmcp.. isn't that basically for remote desktop?.. if so, i don't see why it couldn't, if you install the right apps, etc
well, apparently it was integrated before, now all the dialogs for configuring the system for remote access are gone, and I can't figure out what the story is
where is it distorted?.. there's a couple spots of the video that were distorted, but not the whole thing
